chunks.name: Buyer
chunks.description: The name of the buyer (you) making the offer.

chunks.name: Listing Agent
chunks.description: The name of the seller's agent.

chunks.name: Property Street Address
chunks.description: The street address of the property being acquired.

chunks.name: City
chunks.description: The city of the property being acquired.

chunks.name: County
chunks.description: The county of the property being acquired.

chunks.name: Zip Code
chunks.description: The zip code of the property being acquired.

chunks.name: Assessor's Parcel Number
chunks.description: The parcel number of the property being acquired. This can be found on the county website.

chunks.name: Purchase Price
chunks.description: The amount of money offered for the property.

chunks.name: Close of Escrow
chunks.description: The date or number of days after acceptance when the escrow will close.

chunks.name: Balance of Down Payment
chunks.description: The amount to be deposited into an escrow account.
